articles.description: The Champions League final will not feature an English, German or Spanish side for the first time in 21 years.

articles.description: All the Champions League reaction as Arsenal are beaten in the semi-finals, losing 3-1 on aggregate to Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Champions League reaction: Arsenal knocked out with semi-final defeat to PSG

articles.description: Maro Itoje is set to be confirmed on Thursday as the British and Irish Lions captain for the tour of Australia.
articles.title: Maro Itoje set to be named British and Irish Lions captain

articles.description: Cold, windy and an artificial pitch - what awaits Tottenham at Bodo/Glimt's stadium, which is located 200km north of the Arctic Circle.
articles.title: Bodo/Glimt vs Tottenham: What awaits Spurs in Norway for Europa League semi-final second leg

articles.description: The clock is ticking for Arsenal and manager Mikel Arteta to show they can be winners after Champions League exit to PSG, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal still a nearly team after PSG end Champions league dream

articles.description: Former UFC light-heavyweight champion Alex Pereira denies posting on social media that he was having "thoughts of not fighting any more".
articles.title: UFC: Alex Pereira says he was 'hacked' after possible retirement tweet

articles.description: Somerset batter James Rew replaces the injured Jordan Cox in the England squad for their Test against Zimbabwe later this month.
articles.title: James Rew replaces injured Jordan Cox in England squad for Zimbabwe Test

articles.description: David Beckham and Gary Neville complete a takeover of Salford City as part of a new consortium, buying out the rest of the Class of '92.
articles.title: David Beckham and Gary Neville complete Salford City consortium takeover

articles.description: The New York Knicks produce another stunning comeback to win the second game of their NBA Conference play-off semi-final with the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Second New York Knicks comeback leaves Boston Celtics hanging on

articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma has announces his retirement from Test cricket at the age of 38.
articles.title: Rohit Sharma: India's Test captain retires from longest format
